change.changenote: Section 19 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 276/2021, effective November 2, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Due date by which pre-existing owners must file transparency reports
bcl:section.bcl:text: Transparency reports required to be filed under section 15 (1) [transparency report required from pre-existing and other owners] of the Act must be filed on or before November 30, 2021.

change.changenote: Section 21.1 was enacted by BC Reg 282/2020, effective December 17, 2020.
Section 21.2 was enacted by BC Reg 128/2021, effective May 17, 2021.
Section 21.21 was enacted by BC Reg 112/2022, effective May 2, 2022.
Section 21.3 was enacted by BC Reg 255/2021, effective October 4, 2021.
Section 21.4 was enacted by BC Reg 255/2021, effective October 4, 2021.
Part 4, sections 22 and 23, was enacted by BC Reg 250/2020, effective April 30, 2021.
